Detailed Description

Base class for dforms.

The DForm is the primary component of a DForm deformer. The others are the DzDFormBase, DzDFormZone and DzDFormModifier.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Default Constructor.

DzDForm::~DzDForm (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzDForm::DzDForm ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [protected]

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.

DzDFormModifier * DzDForm::getModifier ( int  i  )  const [slot]

Gets the ith Modifier of the DForm. The index is zero based. Can be used with getNumTargets to iterate over all the DForm Modifiers.

Parameters:
i The index of the modifier to return.
Returns:
The target Modifier at the requested index

Gets the ith Modifier of the DForm. The index is zero based. Can be used with getNumTargets to iterate over all the DForm Modifiers.

Parameters:

Returns:
